resources.string: Austin Pets Bulletin was created by Larry Liu, Thien Vo, and Ali Homafar
For more information about this animal, call: Austin Animal Center at (512) 978-0500

AUSTIN PETS BULLETIN 2015
 The writers of this app are not affiliated with the City of Austin or the Austin Animal Shelter.


Austin Pets Bulletin uses the following 3rd party libraries: 
 Gson 
 Butterknife 
 Jsoup 
 Realm 
 Otto 
 Picasso 

github.markushi:circlebutton 
 github.traex:RippleEffect 
 github.castorflex.smoothprogressbar 


This app is a student project at the University of Texas, created for educational purposes. It is not meant for wide distribution, and we do not mean any legal copyright infringement.
